title: Gillette Fusion5 Mens Razor Blade Refills, 12 Count, Lubrastrip for a More Comfortable Shave
description: Gillette Fusion5 men's blade refills feature five antifriction blades for a shave you can barely feel as well as a Precision Trimmer for hard-to-reach places and for styling facial hair. The Fusion5 has blades that are positioned closely together for incredible comfort. The lubrication strip provides lubrication after the blades and fades when you are no longer getting an optimal shave. Concerned your Gillette handle won't fit? All Fusion5 blades fit all Gillette 5-blade razor handles. Also, each blade refill lasts up to a month of shaves, giving you the ability to customize your shave and get the most out of every blade.
